price: Uko ni na ko bamwe mu bantu twabagize ibigeragezo ku bandi (bamwe tubagira abakire abandi tubagira abakene) kugira ngo (abahakanyi b’abakire) bavuge bati "Ese aba (bakene b’abemera) ni bo Allah yagabiye (kumuyoboka) muri twe (maze twe aratwihorera)?" Ese Allah ntazi neza abashimira?
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ فَتَنَّا بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ لِّيَقُولُوٓاْ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۢ بَيۡنِنَآۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika fatannā baʿḍahum bibaʿḍin liyaqūlū ahāulāi manna al-lahu ʿalayhim min bayninā alaysa al-lahu bi-aʿlama bil-shākirīna
